body:
PR to introduce FEniCS 2019.1.0 support for spack, which is the latest stable version prior to FEniCS-X. The PR is based on the previous PR by [benzwick](https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/10240) and the local spack repo of [JaroslavHron](https://github.com/JaroslavHron/spack_repo/tree/master/fenics).

The changes comprise the 4 python packages,

- FFC: py-fenics-ffc,
- UFL: py-fenics-ufl,
- FIAT: py-fenics-fiat,
- Dijitso: py-fenics-dijitso,

and the main Dolfin package,

- fenics2019.

The dolfin package builds and installs the c++ as well as the python interface of FEniCS. To fix an compilation error with the latest boost package a patch file is provided.
title: FEniCS: update of packages to support 2019.1.0
